original: intros [n HPn]. induction n as [| n IH]. - destruct (HP 0) as [H | H]. + exists 0. split. * auto. * intros x HPx. lia. + exfalso. apply H, HPn. - destruct (HP (S n)) as [H | H]. + exists (S n). split. * auto. * intros x HPx. lia. + destruct (IH HPn) as [m [HPm Hm]]. exists m. split. * auto. * intros x HPx. specialize (Hm x HPx). lia.
